# Course Information
In this BYU-I course I learned about the importance of politics in American life, how the 3 branches work together to make to government function, and how the media can effect politics (and vice versa).

## Projects
### Social Media and Stochastic Terrorism

In this paper, I researched different acts of violence in Myanmar and the United States. I then connected how most acts of domestic terrorism relate to extremist views, strengthened by social media.
